explains: adj. 无法满足的，贪得无厌的

sentences.en: Since technology has such an insatiable appetite for eating up human jobs, this phenomenon will continue to restructure our economy in ways we cannot immediately foresee.
sentences.cn: 由于技术在吞噬人类工作方面非常“贪得无厌”，所以这一现象将会继续以短时间难以预料的方式重构我们的经济。

sentences.en: The public have an insatiable appetite for scandal.
sentences.cn: 公众对丑事总是喜闻乐道。

sentences.en: The man was lascivious, sexually perverted and insatiable.
sentences.cn: 这个人是一个欲壑难填的变态色情狂。
